page.title: 04Local News Newspaper & Radio
page.content: {The Deeside Advertiser.}The Advertiser began on 23rd September 1924.Since 1970,it has been part of the Chester Observer Group.It is delivered to homes in Hawarden ,Mancot ,Saltney ,Sandycroft ,Aston ,Queensferry , Connahs Quay ,and Ewloe.35000 copies are printed each week.It has a staff of 4 reporters,2 photographers, 3 advertising staff and 6 printers.The longest serving person is Mr Roberts who started work as a delivery boy. {BBC Radio Clwyd }657 KHZ broadcasting from Mold Wednesday 19th June 1985.The main news stories:1.Workers at Courtaulds Factory in Wrecsam are resisting moves to close.About 50 people will lose their jobs. 2. Magistrates in Rhyl a seaside holiday town have warned trouble makers of tougher penalties after serious incidents of unruly behaviour.
